about_the_game:
The international RPG Maker MV version of the Brazilian's RPG Maker 2003 classic:
Fantasya Final Definitiva REMAKE!

Samuka, a former noble and skilled samurai from Kaganumato Island, ventures through the world indefinitely after a pub to drink out his misadventures without knowing that the future of Earth, and even the good sake of Time-Space continuum, lays at his hands.

Later, a stray dog, an orphaned martian and a madhouse escapee join his party to journey alongside him through the past and the future on this epic nonsense adventure.

Last Definitive Fantasy is both a parody to shabby made RPG Maker games and homage to old classics of the J-RPG genre.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
